text:
I want the blog post summary to be plain text, w/ limited characters. `formatted += '

' + blogpost.postSummary + '

';` This is using the "callback="blog_post_formatter"" option found in the documentation, and I'm getting a whole mess of html tags from the posts.

I think I got this working. but now I have another issue.
the code is generating the correct tag list, however, the links are "undefined"
Does anyone have any suggestions?
`formatted += blogpost.tagList.map(tag => `<a href="${tag.url}" class="blog-tag">${tag.label}</a>`).join(" ");`
